column4: Does anyone here know how to bypass the "Could not execute the external program msiexec.exe"  when installing Counter Strike Source?
I'm trying to do that, lol! :(
Yes
I have Cedega though. :(
And it says clearly on the cedega forums that it's suported
Doh :(
lol, thanks for the help Tim
Jrex linux, do you have YAhoo/Msn/AIM?
Yea, Jrex, what do you need linux for?
Just have someone do it for you if that's all you need.
what a horrible thing to say
I'm sorry - But Im' being honest. If he doesnt plan to use it on a regular basis he really dosent need to know the ins and outs of linux
life is composed of the experiences within, it's possible to just have someone else do things for you for everything, but then what do you learn?

I guess you've got a point.  I'll resign to say that If I was in his position, I wouldnt learn it just for a server that I'd only interface with for certian things - But I'm not, I'm in tech suport and taking a ton of Techie classes so I need linux (And linux is just more fun)
I agree linux is just more fun :)
<3 the agreements in the middle of disagreements (you see what I did there, <3 is a heart :P )
:P
no chance you play Counterstrike Source, is there? I need someone to walk me through the install
can we speak in a private room, it's hard to read here.
sure thing
can you see the dialoug window?
join #coag
